Intro to Statistical Modeling Ch. 8 Prob.2
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(WriteScoreR)
newScorerSet("SM-8-2-SD")
```

Which of these statements will compute the sum of square residuals of the model 
stored in the object <code>mod</code>?
```{r include=FALSE}
f=newMC(totalPts=1)
```
`r I(f(FALSE))` <code>resid(mod)</code>     
`r I(f(FALSE))` <code>sum(resid(mod))</code>     
`r I(f(FALSE))` <code>sum(resid(mod))^2</code>     
`r I(f(TRUE))` <code>sum(resid(mod)^2 ) </code>     
`r I(f(FALSE))` <code>sum(resid(mod^2 ))</code>     
`r I(f(FALSE))` None of the above.     
```{r include=FALSE, results='hide'}
I(f(finish=TRUE))
```

`r I(closeProblem())`
